name: Cat
desc: A cat is a domestic animal that is often kept as a pet. It is a small, furry animal with four legs, a tail, and sharp claws.

name: Chihuahua
desc: The Chihuahua is the smallest breed of dog, and is named after the Mexican state of Chihuahua. Chihuahuas come in a wide variety of colors, and two coat lengths.

name: frigatebird
desc: Frigatebirds are a family of seabirds called Fregatidae which are found across all tropical and subtropical oceans. The five extant species are classified in a single genus, Fregata.

name: gecko
desc: Geckos are lizards belonging to the infraorder Gekkota, found in warm climates throughout the world. They range from 1.6 to 60 cm.

name: Husky
desc: The Siberian Husky is a medium size working dog breed that originated in Northeast Asia. The breed belongs to the Spitz genetic family.

name: Yellow Crowned Night Heron
desc: The yellow-crowned night heron is one of two species of night herons found in the Americas, the other one being the black-crowned night heron.

name: Bottle Nosed Dolphin
desc: The common bottlenose dolphin, or Atlantic bottlenose dolphin, is the most well-known species from the family Delphinidae.

name: Crocodile
desc: Crocodiles or true crocodiles are large aquatic reptiles that live throughout the tropics in Africa, Asia, the Americas and Australia.

name: Humpback Whale
desc: The humpback whale is a species of baleen whale. One of the larger rorqual species, adults range in length from 12â€“16 m and weigh about 36,000 kg.

name: Pelican
desc: Pelicans are a genus of large water birds that make up the family Pelecanidae. They are characterised by a long beak and a large throat pouch used for catching prey and draining water from the scooped-up contents before swallowing.
